short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly connects resumes from job portals to AI.HYR platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your resume handling with the AI.HYR Resume Connector Chrome extension. Effortlessly manage and upload resumes from popular job portals directly to AI.HYR platform.
 
Login to the account and select the desired job listing and effortlessly add resume for automated evaluation and AI-driven interviews. Simplify your job search journey with AI.HYR Resume Manager, designed to streamline resume management and enhance your application experience.

Key Features:
•	Direct Upload: Upload resumes from different job portals to AI.HYR with ease.
•	Automated Evaluation: Leverage AI technology for efficient resume evaluation and candidate assessment.
•	Integration: Seamlessly integrate with AI.HYR platform for  first level resume screening and 1st round of AI interview experience

How It Works:
Step 1.	Install the Extension: Add the Resume Uploader extension to your Chrome browser.
Step 2.	Login to an Account: Login to the AI.HYR account to start using the extension.
Step 3.	Select the Job: Select the job from the list of jobs to which you want to upload the resume.
Step 4.	Add to AI.HYR: select the resumes which you want to upload
